::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod stood out front the Ark, he was glad the battle was over.
"I better go help Prowl." He says to himself.
"Vehical mode." He transformes to his car mode, and heads for Prowl and
the others.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit stood outfront the Predicon base. Maybe he could talk to
Megatron, now. He walks in to the base.
